metadata.title: Fazl stresses dialogue, says its key to strengthening democracy

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 3 (APP):Maulana Fazlur Rehman, leader of Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam-Fazl (JUI-F), on Friday stressed that dialogue between political parties is crucial aspect of the democratic process, as avoiding talks or refusing negotiations harms democracy. Maulana said that while speaking to Senator Irfan Siddiqui, spokesperson for the government negotiation committee and Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N) leader, who visited him at his residence to inquire about his health. Maulana Fazlur Rehman reiterated that mutual discussions and negotiations are the only way to address key national issues. He further emphasized the need for political harmony to ensure Pakistanas stability and unity across all sectors. Senator Irfan Siddiqui updated Maulana Fazlur Rehman on the progress of negotiations with Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI). He also commended Rehmanas role in amicably resolving the issue of religious seminariesa registration.
content.summary: Maulana Fazlur Rehman emphasized the importance of dialogue between political parties for a strong democracy. He stated that negotiations are crucial for addressing national issues and promoting stability. Senator Irfan Siddiqui visited him to discuss negotiations and commended Rehman's role in resolving religious seminaries registration.
